mapper.sql: orgID, orgCode, orgName, orgShortName, orgLevel, parentOrgID, sortNum, isCurrent, isDelete, createDT, theNote
mapper.select:
select a.orgID as orgID, a.orgCode as orgCode, a.orgName as orgName, a.orgShortName as orgShortName, a.orgLevel as orgLevel, a.parentOrgID as parentOrgID, a.sortNum as sortNum, a.isCurrent as isCurrent, a.isDelete as isDelete, a.createDT as createDT, a.theNote as theNote, b.orgName as parentOrgName from permission_org a left join permission_org b on a.parentOrgID = b.orgID
a.isDelete=1
and ( a.orgID = #{orgID ,jdbcType=INTEGER} or a.parentOrgID = #{orgID ,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
and a.orgCode like '%${orgCode}%'
and a.orgName like '%${orgName}%'
order by a.sortNum asc

select a.orgID as orgID, a.orgCode as orgCode, a.orgName as orgName, a.orgShortName as orgShortName, a.orgLevel as orgLevel, a.parentOrgID as parentOrgID, a.sortNum as sortNum, a.isCurrent as isCurrent, a.isDelete as isDelete, a.createDT as createDT, a.theNote as theNote, b.orgName as parentOrgName from permission_org a left join permission_org b on a.parentOrgID = b.orgID where a.isDelete=1 and a.orgID = #{orgID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
